channel.title: 🏢 Baidu on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in 🏢 Baidu on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: Octopus: A Multi-modal LLM with Parallel Recognition and Sequential Understanding
item.description: Octopus, a novel multi-modal LLM, uses parallel visual recognition and sequential understanding to achieve 5x speedup on visual grounding and improved accuracy on various MLLM tasks.
